title: Thursday's ETF with Unusual Volume: PWB - Nasdaq.com
text: The Invesco Dynamic Large Cap Growth ETF is seeing unusually high volume in afternoon trading Thursday, with over 211,000 shares traded versus three month average volume of about 43,000. Shares of PWB were up about 1.1% on the day.    makeArticleAd();  Components of that ETF with the highest volume on Thursday were Microsoft, trading up about 1.4% with over 12.5 million shares changing hands so far this session, and Twitter, up about 2.8% on volume of over 8.1 million shares. Pioneer Natural Resources is the component faring the best Thursday, higher by about 4% on the day, while Motorola Solutions is lagging other components of the Invesco Dynamic Large Cap Growth ETF, trading lower by about 3.7%.
